fields.name: Punisher Complete deck
fields.description: Punisher Skateboards are crafted with professional quality suitable for all skill sets.  They come pre-assembled, ready to shred with control, balance and supreme pop.  All designs interpret art forms to fit all lifestyles.

fields.name: Punisher Battle Axe Complete Skateboard
fields.description: Punisher Skateboards are crafted with professional quality suitable for all skill sets.  They come pre-assembled, ready to shred with control, balance and supreme pop.  All designs interpret art forms to fit all lifestyles.

fields.name: Dark Star Complete Deck
fields.description: Dark Star Complete Deck, black and red

fields.name: Green Teddy Complete Skateboard
fields.description: The components have been put together to give you the best quality ride at the best price. This is a Junior sized skateboard, everything has been proportionally scaled down to suit the smaller rider and allow them to progress quickly.

fields.name: Plain Wood Deck
fields.description: These Venom Skateboards natural wood grain blank decks are the perfect base to create your own deck graphics. Ideal for painting, drawing or sticker bombs. Also perfect if you just want a simple spare backup / replacement deck.

fields.name: Baxter-Neal Deck
fields.description: abitat and Metal have teamed up to bring you the Silas Baxter Neal Metal skateboard deck. The Silas Baxter Neal Metal deck meausres 8.125'' in width and is constructed from 7-Ply canadian Maple.

fields.name: Panda Deck
fields.description:
Enjoi's classic Panda logo graphic with R7 technology.

R7 technology is a huge advance in skateboard construction which uses extra strong resin to make decks more durable.

fields.name: Revive Deck
fields.description:
Material: 100% HARD ROCK CANADIAN MAPLE

Ply count: 7

These are truly the best boards we can manufacture.

fields.name: Bones Super Swiss Bearings
fields.description: Super REDS are designed from the ground up to be the best bearing on the market at this price point. What Super REDS are not is a REDS bearing with just better super finishing (surface polishing). Super REDS are a superior quality bearing, using higher quality steel races, better quality and grade balls, and a superior surface finish. The result is a bearing that is as fast as REDS but quieter, smoother, and longer lasting. Super REDS use a black shield and laser engraving to differentiate themselves from original REDS. Skate Bearings are a standard size which will fit all wheels including Skateboards, Scooters, Inlines, Quad Skates, etc. Bones bearings are not ABEC rated they are SKATE rated - This means they are specifically designed and suited to be used with Skate and other action sport equipment.

fields.name: ABEC5 Bearings
fields.description: These bearings are okay for most skaters - however not skate rated - i.e. not been subject to lateral / axial (sideways) impact or movement. As you skate, learning side to side slows bearings down - friction on the inner race and shield causes the bearings to flex and slow. This is because the bearing cage is not designed for roller skate use with axial movement.

fields.name: Bronson Bearings
fields.description: Bronson Bearing are the newest addition to the NHS camp to join infamous brands such as Independent and Santa Cruz. Bronson bearings might be a new company but they have hit the industry by force, offering strong, reliable, fast, and smooth bearings to the masses in an array of different constructions. From the basic G2 bearing to the Ceramic bearings, If you see the name Bronson on them you know you are in for a good ride.

fields.description:

fields.name: Red Spitfire Wheels
fields.description:
The 80HD Chargers Skateboard wheels feature

80HD Reformulated Urethane (Soft)
Chemically Bonded To Polyurethane Core
Classic Cut
56mm Diameter
Clear Urethane
Set Of Four Wheels
Buy Spitfire 80HD Chargers Skateboard Wheels at Native Skate Store.

The Spitfire 80HD Chargers are made with reformulated 80HD urethane that's chemically bonded to the polyurethane core resulting in lasting speed on all terrain. The 80HD Chargers Clear are 56mm in diameter and have a classic cut. All our skateboard wheels are sold as a set of four.

fields.name: Blue Spitfire Wheels
fields.description:
Spitfire Formula Four is an advanced formula polyurethane that offers high performance and rebound, whilst remaining durable.
With yellow and black classic spiral graphic on the outer facing side and minimal branding print on the inner facing side.
Classic shape, known for speed and control
Flatspot resistant
Smooth anti-stick surface
Size: 56mm
Durometer: 99

fields.description:
Grizzly Stamp Print (White) Griptape Features:

Stamp Print Grip
Printed Graphic
9'' x 33'' Approx

fields.name: Camo Skull Griptape
fields.description:
Premium Material: The grip tape sheet is made of high quality sandpaper specially-selected for skateboard with silicon carbide surface, proper thickness that will not wear out. Waterproof, durable and anti-slip material with large friction force that grips your shoes on skateboard firmly.
Skateboard Grip Tape Size: 33 inches x 9 inches / 84cm x 23 cm - package included only 1 sheet. This griptape sheet is easy to trim the edge clearly, suitable for most skateboards, skate scooters, kick scooters, slide plates, roller boards, cruiser boards and so on.
Upgrade Longboard Grip: The skateboard grip tapes with exclusive perforation technique for a bubble-free support. Sticky adhesive that won't peel in extreme heat or cold for a long lasting grip.
Top Performance Grip Tape: Durability and control on your longboard or skateboard deck whether you slide, drift, carve, race, downhill, slalom, or freeride. Best adhesion & grip design for scooter & skateboard riders of all levels. Improves rider's grip and ensures various skating tricks safely.
Attractive Griptape Your Choice: A skateboard grip tape is specially designed by Lianmei. Vibrant color with long lasting color fastness. Exquisite pattern is attractive and makes you stand out. Great gift for your family or friends who are skateboarder.

fields.name: Jessup Griptape
fields.description: A staple product for skateboarders for as long as we can remember. Jessup has always been the standard griptape of choice. Cut fresh from the roll this measures up at 9" wide by 33" long per sheet to cover you average skateboard deck.

fields.name: Oil Spill Trucks
fields.description: Proven lightening quick response. lightweight design & unmatched levels of control and strength.

fields.name: Plain Silver Trucks
fields.description: Proven lightening quick response. lightweight design & unmatched levels of control and strength.

fields.name: Thrasher Trucks
fields.description: Proven lightening quick response. lightweight design & unmatched levels of control and strength.

fields.name: Gold Trucks
fields.description: Comes As A Pair Of Trucks Ready To Shred!

fields.name: Thrasher Black Shirt
fields.description:
Front Chest Logo
Regular Fit
Colour - Black

fields.name: Thrasher Black Hexagram Shirt
fields.description: If you didn't already know Thrasher Magazine have been documenting skateboarding for over 30 years now. This iconic brand/magazine certainly know a thing about skateboarding and there clothing can be seen on the backs of hundreds of well known skaters worldwide.

fields.name: Element 92 White Shirt
fields.description: Skate hard and look good is the motto of skate brand Element. Founded during the early 90s in the surf ’n’ skate state of California, the label fuses high-quality construction with skate-inspired designs. Bold slogan t-shirts, jackets and backpacks lead a collection inspired by an active lifestyle, while an organic range caters to the brand’s earth-loving motifs.

fields.name: Element White Logo Shirt
fields.description: Skate hard and look good is the motto of skate brand Element. Founded during the early 90s in the surf ’n’ skate state of California, the label fuses high-quality construction with skate-inspired designs. Bold slogan t-shirts, jackets and backpacks lead a collection inspired by an active lifestyle, while an organic range caters to the brand’s earth-loving motifs.

fields.name: Element Black Hightop Sneakers
fields.description: Skate hard and look good is the motto of skate brand Element. Founded during the early 90s in the surf ’n’ skate state of California, the label fuses high-quality construction with skate-inspired designs. Bold slogan t-shirts, jackets and backpacks lead a collection inspired by an active lifestyle, while an organic range caters to the brand’s earth-loving motifs.

fields.name: Vans Black Hightops
fields.description: A lightweight, lace-up, high top shoe, the Vans Sk8-Hi features heel cushioning for extra comfort, re-enforced toecaps for durability, and padded collars for support and flexibility. Signature rubber waffle outsoles give this shoe a firmer grip.

fields.name: Vans Black Lowtop Sneakers
fields.description: The first to bear the iconic side stripe, the Vans Old Skool is a low top, lace-up shoe. It is lined, has padded collars for support and flexibility, re-enforced toecaps to withstand repeated wear, and features the Vans signature waffle outsole for a firmer grip.

fields.name: DC Black Lowtop Sneakers
fields.description: Designed and tested by the DC skate team, the Hyde is an affordable shoe that’ll keep the whole crew pushing. When it comes to the functionality and durability of vulcanized skate shoes, you can’t go wrong with the simple style and versatility of the Hyde.

fields.name: Addidas Black and Grey Windbreaker
fields.description: Rock climbing in the '80s was a full vibe. An era of exploration, this adidas Adventure jacket takes inspiration from the time and brings it to life. You won't be climbing any crags in this, but you will stay comfortable. The sleek build helps block out the wind, with bungee-adjustable details on the hood and hem to protect you further. It easily layers with a loose shape for full freedom of movement.

fields.name: Addidas Grey, Black and Red Windbreaker
fields.description:
Community. Fitness. Fun. You run for a lot of reasons. Zip up in this juniors' adidas windbreaker and don't let a little bad weather hold you back from getting out there. WIND.RDY blocks the wind and repels light rain so you stay warm and dry. The ventilated back adds breathability so you can go hard.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

fields.name: Nike Yellow Windbreaker
fields.description: The Nike Windrunner Jacket is your go-to shell that's wind- and water-repellent. A vent on the back and a packable design keep you ready to take on the miles.

fields.name: Black Hardware Bolts
fields.description: Looking to get a subtle black set of skateboard hardware? Then grab your preferred length of the Pig Phillips head skateboard hardware.

fields.name: Multi Coloured Hardware Bolts
fields.description:
Multi coloured rainbow coloured bolts.

Perfect size for use without riser pads or can be used with shock pads.

fields.name: Blue Jeans
fields.description: a classic straight fit with a stylish but relaxed feel. The Jean features a traditional 5 pocket design with zip fly and button fastening, accompanied by a branded belt with adjustable sizes for a comfortable

fields.name: Worn Baggy Jeans
fields.description: Look stylish in great comfort in these Jeans with its dark denim construction they will go well with any outfit. These jeans benefit from a button fly fastening for a more secure fit.
